_header: For fear or for favor of any false man
Subjects: de la Pole, William, duke of Suffolk, verses against; political poems
_description: Verses against the Duke of Suffolk — one 15-line stanza

BLCottRollsII23.First Lines:
ffor feer or for fauour of ony fals manLoose not the loue of al
                    þ commynalite…
BLCottRollsII23.Last Lines:
…Hong vp suche men to our souerayn lordThat euer counseld hym
                    with fals men to be acord
